argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummptcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummptcl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 3 |  | gsummptcl.n | |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) |
| 4 |  | gsummptcl.e | |- ( ph -> A. i e. N X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( i e. N |-> X ) = ( i e. N |-> X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fmpt | |- ( A. i e. N X e. B <-> ( i e. N |-> X ) : N --> B ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( i e. N |-> X ) : N --> B ) |
| 9 | 6 | #P_fnmpt | |- ( A. i e. N X e. B -> ( i e. N |-> X ) Fn N ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( i e. N |-> X ) Fn N ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` G ) e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( 0g ` G ) e. _V ) |
| 13 | 10, 3, 12 | #P_fndmfifsupp | |- ( ph -> ( i e. N |-> X ) finSupp ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 5, 2, 3, 8, 13 | #P_gsumcl | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( i e. N |-> X ) ) e. B ) |
